fields.description: All events should have a start date. Dates should be in YYYY-MM-DD or date-time format. If the month or day are not available, these may be omitted.
fields.name: startDate
fields.title: Start Date

fields.description: Events or activities lasting more than one day should have either a duration (in months) or an end date. Dates should be in YYYY-MM-DD or date-time format. If the month or day are not available, these may be omitted.
fields.name: endDate
fields.title: End Date

fields.description: Events or activities lasting more than one day should have either a duration (in months) or an end date.
fields.name: duration
fields.title: Duration (months)

fields.description: When was information about this event last modified? A full date-time should be given. Usually this can be generated automatically by the software managing or exporting this data.
fields.name: dateModified
fields.title: Last modified
